title: Although I Am Only Level 1, but with This Unique Skill, I Am the Strongest - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Artifacts   Cheats   Demi-Humans   Dense Protagonist   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Firearms   Game Elements   Gunfighters   Level System   Loli   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   R-15   Special Abilities   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Unreliable Narrator   World Travel
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description:
Satou Ryouta who died from overworking at a black company was reincarnated to another world. Although Ryouta was alive, he is now burdened with the inconvenience that his level is fixed to 1 in this new world.

Although he wasn’t able to raise his level, he had a unique skill that can create a cheat-like item that shouldn’t exist in the world from a monster.

He got to know about his status and MAX them with the help of ability-up items. He gathered a number of weapons and items that can only be used by himself, allowing him to be level 1 but yet, having the strongest equipment.>
